Module br.ufrn.imd.visao
Package br.ufrn.imd.modelo

Class Board

java.lang.Object
br.ufrn.imd.modelo.Board
public class Board extends Object
Represents a game board consisting of cells and ships.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Board()
    Constructs a Board with a grid of 10x10 cells and initializes ships list.

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board()
      Constructs a Board with a grid of 10x10 cells and initializes ships list.

  • Method Details

    • placeShip

      public void placeShip(Ship ship, CellButton cellIni)
      Places a ship on the board starting from the specified initial cell.
      Parameters:
      ship - The ship to place on the board.
      cellIni - The initial cell where the ship starts.

    • hitCells

      public void hitCells(int row, int col)
      Hits the cell at the specified row and column coordinates. Updates the ship's status if any ship is hit.
      Parameters:
      row - The row coordinate of the cell to hit.
      col - The column coordinate of the cell to hit.

    • buscarCellNavio

      public void buscarCellNavio(int coluna, int altura)
      Searches for a ship cell at the specified column and row coordinates. Marks the cell as hit if found.
      Parameters:
      coluna - The column coordinate to search.
      altura - The row coordinate to search.

    • attListaNavios

      public void attListaNavios()
      Updates the list of ships, removing ships that are no longer alive.

    • getCell

      public CellButton getCell(int row, int col)
      Retrieves the cell button at the specified row and column coordinates. Throws an exception if the coordinates are out of the board's range.
      Parameters:
      row - The row coordinate of the cell button.
      col - The column coordinate of the cell button.
      Returns:
      The CellButton object at the specified coordinates.
      Throws:
      ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - if the coordinates are out of bounds.

    • setNumShips

      public void setNumShips(int numShips)
      Sets the number of ships currently on the board.
      Parameters:
      numShips - The number of ships to set.

    • getShips

      public List<Ship> getShips()
      Retrieves the list of ships currently on the board.
      Returns:
      The list of Ship objects on the board.

    • getNumShips

      public int getNumShips()
      Retrieves the number of ships currently on the board.
      Returns:
      The number of ships on the board.
